Name: Royal Domain of Drottningholm. short_description:

The Royal Domain of Drottningholm stands on an island in Lake MÃ¤lar in a suburb of Stockholm. With its castle, perfectly preserved theatre (built in 1766), Chinese pavilion and gardens, it is the finest example of an 18th-century north European royal residence inspired by the Palace of Versailles.
